description.brief: A Robot Control Interface for OpenRAVE

package.description:
Contains messages, services, and OpenRAVE clients to interface to robot hardware.
- librobot_control - openrave plugin for ros client to talk to robot services - openravecontroller.h - base class for robot server using services - tfsender - given joint positions of the robot, sends the correct tf frames
For more information on how to use this inside the openrave framework, see: http://openrave.programmingvision.com/wiki/index.php/ROS:ControllingRobots
package.author: Rosen Diankov (rosen.diankov@gmail.com)
